faq.question: Is this Markdown to PDF converter really free?
faq.answer: Yes, Markdown Free is 100% free with no hidden costs, premium tiers, or signup requirements.

faq.question: Do you store or log my Markdown files?
faq.answer: No. Your files are processed temporarily in memory during conversion and immediately discarded. We never store your content on disk or in any database.

faq.question: Do you track me or use cookies?
faq.answer: We don't use advertising trackers, sell your data, or track you across websites. We use privacy-respecting analytics but never log file contents or personal information.

faq.question: Which formats does Markdown Free support?
faq.answer: Input: .md, .markdown, .txt files (up to 5MB). Output: PDF, HTML, TXT. Supports GitHub Flavored Markdown.

faq.question: Is the conversion secure?
faq.answer: Yes. All connections use HTTPS. Markdown preview renders client-side. PDF generation is server-side but content is never persisted. All HTML is XSS-sanitized.
